data.text: @Marcossaieg Al tener novedades de tu caso, te lo haremos saber.
@Marcossaieg Por favor, aguarda nuestro contacto.

@Marcossaieg Hola, comprendemos el malestar que genera esta situación, por ello seguimos trabajando para ti. Pedimos estar al tanto de tu buzón de entrada y spam, pues toda novedad será enviada a través de tu correo electrónico. Saludos.
@machubouer We are working on your case 30082146 and we will contact you with an answer. Regards.
@AlineMorales1 Hi, please send us a DM with the booking code and more details of your request. Regards.
@Aguicipili Estamos apra servirte, que tengas un excelente día.

urls.title: Requisitos para viajar | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Conoce las restricciones para viajar dentro y fuera de Estados Unidos.

data.text: @Aguicipili Hola, no sería lo mismo, las autoridades de Argentina solicitan un resultado negativo de PCR. Puedes verificar más información aquí: https://t.co/AhK3vDkFm8, saludos.
@alexelperucho Hello, please send us your reservation code via DM, so we can check it, regards.
@danielatorrrres Hello Daniela, let us know what was the problem via DM, regards.
@leticia34176097 Hi, we have sent a response through DM. Regards.

@pauconde2 Hola, los requisitos y restricciones para el ingreso a Estados Unidos están detallados aquí: https://t.co/DgCKVzuJ21. Para mayor información, debes comunicarte con la entidad de extranjería del país. Saludos.
@Rodrigo65566083 We have sent you a response via DM. Regards.
@ve_ff Hola, aún seguimos trabajando para ti, una vez que tengamos respuesta o mayores detalles nos estaremos contactando contigo a través de tu correo electrónico.
@jusjessi Hi, send us your case number along with your full name and the booking code through a DM to look into that issue. Regards.
@lucerocrdz gracias a ti por escribirnos. Saludos.
@lucerocrdz Hola Lucero, lamentamos el tiempo de respuesta, cuéntanos detalladamente cómo asistirte. Quedamos atentos,saludos.
@ronildo Hello, we apologize for your bad experience, we will take note of your message in order to become a better airline with the best possible service. Have a nice day.

@ronildo Hi, thanks to the action of HEPA filters that were implemented into the cabin ventilation system, 99.9% of viruses and bacteria are removed from the air, and this system renews it every 3 minutes. You can check more here: https://t.co/Io058dVd24. Regards.

data.text: When you fly, your safety is our most important concern, so don’t forget to review your #LATAMChecklist which contains all the requirements you must meet for your trip to make sure that you are ready to travel. Find out more at https://t.co/OXUH9LR2xp https://t.co/cShfHqUqEr
@rmp289 Hi, send us your booking code and more details about your request through a DM to look into it. Regards.

#AttentionPassengers: The list of "country or risk zone" to enter Spain will be updated as of January 11. All passengers traveling from these countries must present a negative RT-PCR test, without exceptions. Find the list and requirements at https://t.co/OXUH9LR2xp
@pierinamj Hello, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@ve_ff Recuerda que estamos gestionando tu solicitud de manera interna y nos estaremos comunicando con una respuesta. Saludos.
@Rodrigo65566083 Hi, we have sent a response through DM. Regards.
@Rodrigo65566083 We sent you a DM.
@Rodrigo65566083 Hi, we sent you a DM.
@ve_ff Indícanos por DM el número de tu caso para asistirte. Quedamos atentos.
@ve_ff Hola, envíanos un DM con mayor detalle de lo sucedido para ayudarte por este medio. Estaremos atentos.

@01luis10 Hola, para asistirte indícanos vía DM cuál es tu código de reserva (6 letras) y/o número de ticket (13 dígitos numéricos) más nombres y apellidos de uno de los pasajeros. Quedamos atentos a la información. ¡Saludos!
@Rodrigo65566083 Hi, send us a DM with your booking code to look into it.
@_jdmxm Hi, send us your booking code and full name through a DM to check your situation. Regards.
@jatinkhurana192 We've replied through DM, regards.
@jatinkhurana192 We can help you through this means, please send us via DM your booking code or ticket number and the full name of the passenger. We will await for your reply. Regards.
@jatinkhurana192 Hello, we can help you through this means. Please, send us further information via email as soon as we have a formal response. Regards.

data.text: @anwar_torres Hello, this test is required for all passengers travelling to Chile; also, a 10-day quarantine upon arrival is needed. For more information, enter here: https://t.co/PY8KjDamfb; however, it's necessary that you request the official information to the health authorities. Regards.

This new requirement is in addition to the mandatory 10-day quarantine from the time they enter the country or until they leave Chile (in case they stay for less than 10 days). We will continue to inform about new updates from the authorities.

#AttentionPassengers: From January 7th on, ALL passengers entering Chile (nationals, residents, and tourists) must present a negative RT-PCR test, performed a maximum of 72 hours before boarding the flight to Chile. More information at https://t.co/OXUH9LR2xp
@LamiaPF We can check the information if you send us the details about the situation through a DM. Regards.
@LamiaPF Hi, if you need assistance, send us your query through a DM. Regards.
@Mugartegui Hola, nos preocupa lo que nos comentas, por lo cual, indicanos vía DM en que podemos asistirte por este medio. Quedamos atentos a tus comentarios.Saludos.

@steverudderham Hi, let us check the information, please provide via DM, the booking code or the ticket number (13 digits) and confirm the name/last name of the passenger. We'll be awaiting your response.
@edith_espejo Hello, send us your booking code and the names of the passengers via DM, in order to look into this. Regards.
@callmedaddyAtl Hi, send us a DM with your Travel Voucher number and full name to check it. We'll stay tuned.
@vico3004 Te hemos respondido por DM.
@vico3004 Hola, indícanos por DM tu número de ticket, nombre y apellido del pasajero. Quedamos atentos.
@moisesluza Hi, send us a DM with your ticket or Travel Voucher number and your full name to check the request. We'll stay tuned.

@alejob777 Alex777, te sugerimos eliminarla publicación anterior, ya que cuenta con información importante sobre tu viaje. Envianos vía DM código de reserva y nombre completo del pasajero para asistirte de manera oportuna. Saludos.
@alejob777 Hola @alejob777, por favor indicanos más detalles sobre tu requerimiento para asistirte de manera oportuna. Saludos.
@itsmektdd Hello, send us the booking code and the names of the passengers via DM. Regards.
@rapidla1 Hello, send us the booking code and the names of the passengers via DM, in order to provide more information. Regards.
@KarinTaps As soon as we have more details about your request, we will notify you. Regards.
@DanSolyom Hi, please send us a DM with more details of what happened, as well as the passenger's booking code(6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers), and full name. We'll stay tuned.

urls.title: Viaje con mascotas | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Viaja con tu mascota y sigan creando recuerdos juntos. Llévala en cabina o bodega, y conoce las condiciones para hacerlo.

data.text: @ElenaMogollonC1 Hola, el servicio de mascota en cabina se solicita hasta 24 horas antes del vuelo y de bodega, hasta 48 horas antes del vuelo. Puedes ver los requisitos, condiciones y el costo a través del siguiente enlace: https://t.co/6fRESitzYT. Saludos.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @KarinTaps Karin, we're sorry for the delay of the answer but right now the internal area has a lot of cases to solve because of covid19. We are updating yours, so they can contact you sooner, thank you.
@KarinTaps Hello, we added your comments to the case in order to assist you, and more information will be sent via email as soon as possible. Regards.
@JamesSt86693173 Hi, if you mean flights from London to Sao Paulo, we checked our availability, and there are flights on that route since January 2nd. Regards.
@CelinaOrruma Te hemos enviado un mensaje vía DM. Saludos.
@KarinTaps Hi, we are working on your case and we will send you an email with more information. Regards.
@CelinaOrruma Hola, te enviamos una respuesta por DM. Saludos.

@CelinaOrruma Hola, para asistirte, indícanos por DM el número de reclamo o caso. Asimismo, envíanos el código de reserva/número de ticket electrónico, nombre y apellido del pasajero. Quedamos atentos. Saludos.

#AttentionPassengers as of today, 30/12, providing a negative RT-PCR test result and Health Affidavit (DSV) will be mandatory to enter Brazil or transit through the country. Check out more information at https://t.co/OXUH9LR2xp

data.text: @chrishampson Hi, that route is available from January 11th, be aware that all our flights are subject to availability and changes. Check your flights here: https://t.co/tdfS2SshY4, read the conditions of the fares that you are about to buy. Regards.

data.text: #UnitedStates: as of 28 December 2020, all the passengers traveling to the US from the UK must provide a negative result of the PCR or antigen test, taken no more than 72 h before the departure. Children under 2 years old are exempted. More information at https://t.co/tWDTcQMUfQ https://t.co/cAhWILAtsQ
@neyrad23 Hola, puedes generar tu reclamo a través del siguiente enlace: https://t.co/Vp2O4v4VPJ. Saludos.

@neyrad23 Hola, te contamos que nuestras tarifas están sujetas a disponibilidad y sus precios cambian constantemente, por lo que no es posible indicarte un precio o mantenerte uno, te sugerimos realizar la compra a través de nuestra página web. Saludos.

@nico_p90 Hello, in order to check if there is a reservation code registered in our system please send us the following information via DM: full name, passport number, email address, dates and route of the trip. We will await for your reply.
@jeremyatl1 We've sent you a DM. Regards.
@Isabbaptista Olá Isabela, como podemos te ajudar? Se preferir, nos detalhe via DM e informe o seu bilhete de viagem.

data.text: @jeremyatl1 Hi Jeremy, regarding your booking AJFQNN, your flight is on time and changes will be subject to fare difference. Please send us the new date of travel to verify availability. Regards.
@fcornu Send us through DM more details about your request in order to assist you.
@fcornu Hi, you can call our Contact Center at 1 866 435 9526. In addition, we can assist you through this media. To do so, let us know your request. We'll be waiting for your reply.
@cicaeavovozumbi We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@cicaeavovozumbi We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@thedbeaudoin Hi, if you need assistance, please send us a DM with more details. Regards.
@KhamilleOutLoud Hi, we sent you a DM.
@lfjaramillo We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@lfjaramillo Please send us a DM with an image of the charge, your booking code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers), and your full name.
@lfjaramillo In case you need further assistance, just let us know. Regards.

@lfjaramillo The show up time we suggest will allow you to do all the steps needed to board your flight with enough time so you won't miss the boarding time. All the flights are subject to availability and changes. Regards.
@lfjaramillo Hi, if you need assistance, send us your booking code through a DM with more details about your request. Regards.

data.text: @jeremyatl1 Please write through DM, and we suggest eliminating the message with the booking code to protect the confidentiality of your personal information. Regards.
@jeremyatl1 Please send us a DM with your booking code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers), and your full name. We'll stay tuned.
@KhamilleOutLoud Hi, we'll be getting back to you as soon as we can. Stay tuned. Regards.

@jeremyatl1 Hello, in this case, we will not extend the validity of the point that are about to expire. We suggest you to verify your opportunities to use your points for future flights or you can check further information here: https://t.co/UNS3R0RXwY. Regards.
@kathyAnabel_ We have sent you a response via DM. Regards.
@KhamilleOutLoud We have sent you a response via DM. Regards.
@KhamilleOutLoud Hello, we have requested you some information in order to help you. Regards.
@KhamilleOutLoud Hello, please send us your booking code or ticket number and your full name via DM. We will await for your reply. Regards.
@aimeeloubarrett We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@GeorgeMo We sent you a final answer on August 26th. Thanks.
@Javier29103706 Hi, we have sent a response through DM. Regards.
@GeorgeMo Hello, can you provide us the claim number related to your luggage reimbursement. We are waiting on your reply.

@rafaemoraes Hi, send us more details of what happened through DM along with the passenger's booking code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers) and full name. We'll stay tuned.
